snippet: An intense thunderstorm flooded expressways in and around Toronto, shut down the city’s transit system, closed one of its airports and led to power failures.
abstract: Intense thunderstorm in Toronto floods expressways, shuts down the city’s transit system, closes one of its airports and leads to power failures that affect hundreds of thousands of customers.
lead_paragraph: An intense thunderstorm flooded expressways in and around Toronto, shut down the city’s transit system, closed one of its airports and led to power failures.
